content.text: Match ends, Almería 2, Córdoba 1.
Second Half ends, Almería 2, Córdoba 1.
Goal!  Almería 2, Córdoba 1. Juanma Ortiz (Almería) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal following a corner.
Corner,  Almería. Conceded by José Fernández.
Henok Goitom (Almería) hits the bar with a header from the centre of the box. Assisted by Carlos García with a headed pass following a set piece situation.
